meanings.definition: To surpass in bitchiness or complaining.
meanings.sent1: She was outbitching everyone in the office with her constant complaints.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe how much she outbitches her friends about everything.
meanings.sent3: Her outbitching about the weather made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her outbitching reached new heights when she complained about the color of the walls.
meanings.sent5: The way she outbitches is truly impressive.

meanings.definition: To outdo in complaining or criticizing.
meanings.sent1: He is always outbitching his siblings when it comes to chores.
meanings.sent2: She outbitches everyone in the class with her constant criticisms.
meanings.sent3: His outbitching about the food at the party was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her outbitching of the movie was like a never-ending stream of complaints.
meanings.sent5: The way he outbitches about everything is exhausting.
